welcomeSlide.title: Welcome to MyCoach!
welcomeSlide.description:
Start recording your workouts right now!
Plan, develop, achieve goals, share progress.
Become a better version of yourself!

coachSlide.title: Find your coach
coachSlide.description:
Plan your workouts with your personal coach.
Find the best one in your area.

communitySlide.title: Join the community
communitySlide.description:
Connect with the sports community.
Share your best practices, tips and successes.

genderStep.title: Please select your gender
genderStep.text: Let's get to know you better. This will help you better track your progress.

roleStep.title: Choose your role
roleStep.description: Please note that once you have registered, you will not be able to change your role.

trainee.title: Trainee
trainee.description: You can record your own progress, manage your calendar, communicate with a coach or in the community.

coach.title: Coach
coach.description: You have the functionality of a student, you can follow the progress of other students, send invitations to training.

heightStep.title: Enter your height
heightStep.text: It is better to measure height in the morning, since by the evening a person’s height may decrease.

weightStep.title: Enter your weight
weightStep.text: Floor scales may show an incorrect result if the floor surface is uneven, so the scales must stand in the same place.

usernameStep.title: Enter a username
usernameStep.text: You need to come up with a username. You can change it at any time in the Settings.

avatarStep.title: Upload your avatar
avatarStep.text: Click to upload your avatar. You can do it later in the Settings.

modal.title: Delete account
modal.description: Do you really want to delete your account?

email.invalid: Invalid email address. Please correct and try again
email.unavailable: Sorry, this email address has already been taken

password.invalid: Minimum 6 characters: uppercase and lowercase characters and numbers.

fullName.tooShort: Full name is too short - should be 1 chars minimum
fullName.tooLong: Full name should have maximum 50 characters
fullName.invalid: Full name can only contain cyrillic and latin letters or '-'

username.invalid: Username can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and the following symbols: '_', '.'.
username.tooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
username.tooLong: Username can't be more than 20 characters
username.unavailable: Sorry, this username has already been taken

height.min: Height must be greater than or equal to 70
height.max: Height must be less than or equal to 250

weight.min: Weight must be greater than or equal to 30
weight.max: Weight must be less than or equal to 250

addUserInfoFailed.title: Failed to add information
addUserInfoFailed.message: Sorry, we couldn't add the information you provided. Please double-check that all the information is correct and try again.

editUserInfoFailed.title: Failed to edit information
editUserInfoFailed.message: Sorry, we couldn't edit the information you provided. Please double-check that all the information is correct and try again.

deleteAccountFailed.title: Failed to delete your account
deleteAccountFailed.message: Sorry, we couldn't delete your account. Try again later.

deleteAvatarFailed.title: Failed to delete your avatar
deleteAvatarFailed.message: Sorry, we couldn't delete your avatar. Try again later.

galleryAccess.title: Access is denied
galleryAccess.message: You've refused to allow this app to access your photos!

cameraAccess.title: Access is denied
cameraAccess.message: You've refused to allow this app to access your camera!

deleteImage.title: Delete image
deleteImage.description: Do you really want to delete your image?

empty.title: There are no trainings
empty.description: Your workouts will be displayed here

added.title: No exercises added
added.description: Select and add exercises to display here

search.title: No exercises found
search.description: Please change your search query to display here
